mapper.insert: INSERT INTO media ( seq, member_id, img, div ) VALUES ( MEDIA_SEQ.nextVal, #{memberId}, #{img}, #{div} )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_id as memberId, img, div FROM media Where member_id = #{memberId} And div = #{div}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM media WHERE member_id = #{memberId} And div = #{div}
